trans-unit.source: Defines the direction and the property name to be used as the criteria for sorting a collection.
trans-unit.target: Angir retningen og navnet på egenskapen som skal brukes som vilkår for å sortere en samling.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to sort the list by.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på egenskapen for å sortere listen etter.

trans-unit.source: The sort order.
trans-unit.target: Sorteringsrekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: The propertyName parameter cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: Den propertyName parameteren kan ikke være null.

trans-unit.source: The propertyName parameter cannot be empty
trans-unit.target: Den propertyName parameteren kan ikke være tom

trans-unit.source: The direction parameter does not specify a valid value.
trans-unit.target: Den direction parameteren angir ikke en gyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to sort in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om du vil sortere i stigende eller synkende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref> value to indicate whether to sort in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"> </xref> verdi for å angi om du vil sortere i stigende eller synkende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: Compares the specified instance and the current instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> for value equality.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligner den angitte forekomsten og den gjeldende forekomsten av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"> </xref> for likhet, verdi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"> </xref> forekomsten du vil sammenligne.

trans-unit.source: if obj and this instance of have the same values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis obj og denne forekomsten av har samme verdier.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer hashkoden for denne forekomsten av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hash-kode for denne forekomsten av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this object is in an immutable state.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om dette objektet er i en uforanderlig tilstand.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object is in use; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dette objektet er i bruk. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects for value equality.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligner to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"> </xref> objekter for likhet, verdi.

trans-unit.source: The first instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: Den første forekomsten skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: The second instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: Den andre forekomsten skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis de to objektene er like. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects for value inequality.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligner to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"> </xref> objekter for verdien ulikhet.

trans-unit.source: The first instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: Den første forekomsten skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: The second instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: Den andre forekomsten skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the values are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verdiene er like. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property name being used as the sorting criteria.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på egenskapen som brukes som sorteringskriteriet.

trans-unit.source: This property should be a public property of the items in the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen må være en offentlig elementene i samlingen underliggende-egenskap.

trans-unit.source: The string is interpreted by the particular <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView> object involved in the sorting.
trans-unit.target: Strengen tolkes av en bestemt <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView>objektet involvert i sorteringen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView> only supports simple column names.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>støtter bare enkle kolonnenavn.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView> supports general property paths and `XPath` for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>støtter generelle egenskapsbaner og `XPath` for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data.</xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when the view is a <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView> object, you can sort [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes in an <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> based on an attribute of those nodes.
trans-unit.target: Når visningen er derfor en <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>objektet, kan du sortere [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] nodene i en <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>basert på et attributt for nodene.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the attribute name is `Cost`, you would specify "@Cost" for the PropertyName in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis attributtnavnet er for eksempel `Cost`, du vil angi "@Cost" for PropertyName i <xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription>

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er null.
